src:
BTS Jimin's charmed everyone with his explosive visual in BTS 2020 Season's Greeting followed by all day trending on Twitter
06 Nov 2019, 06:12 by parkhaneul1013



BTS Jimin once again charmed everyone's heart with his explosive visual in BTS 2020 Season's Greeting preview on YouTube and Facebook. 
BTS Jimin who previously recognized as a fashionable idol in GQ magazine and #BoF500 appeared with glittering hair wearing a Saint Laurent top and Chanel necklace.



Shortly after the released of the preview BTS Jimin quickly trended in several countries. BTS Jimin recorded 31 trend in 30 countries with two keywords. Keyword 'Jimin' trended in 29 countries while keyword 'J'aime Jimin' (I love you Jimin) trended in France.



Cr to @SuperStar_Jimin


Shortly after the release of the preview clip, BTS official Facebook account uploaded the photo preview for BTS 2020 Season's Greeting and BTS Jimin continue to charmed everyone with his visual.



Being able to pulled off any kind of style and any hair style or any hair color regardless of time and place, BTS Jimin really prove himself as a fashionable idol.
Sourcehttp://www.kukinews.com/news/article.html?no=716624https://www.horsebiz.co.kr/news/articleView.html?idxno=56114#07Luhttp://www.apsk.co.kr/news/articleView.html?idxno=22832#0Bt3http://www.kndaily.co.kr/news/articleView.html?idxno=130552#0BJr
